text: قَدۡ صَدَّقۡتَ ٱلرُّءۡيَآۚ إِنَّا كَذَٰلِكَ نَجۡزِي ٱلۡمُحۡسِنِينَ
translation: Ni ukuri, wamaze gushira mu ngiro ico wategetswe mu ndoto. Ni nk’uko nyene rero mu vy’ukuri Twebwe Allah - Twahemvye Ibrahimu kw’ishirwa mu ngiro ry’indoto yiwe - Duhemba abagwaneza mu kubakura mu vyago mu buzima bwo kw’isi no mu bw’inyuma yo gupfa;
